Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Damen
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Damen, 55th, Western & 59th, due to street blockage near 59th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Damen, 55th, Western, then resume their normal route at 59th, due to street blockage near 59th/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.
